keyval.val: Box plots, microarray data, 14-3-3 theta fraction. Samples were hybridized with A549 natural protein microarrays in three batches. Box plots and ROC analysis for all samples and samples in each individual batches were presented.

Proteins from human lung adenocarcinoma cell line A549 lysates were separated by anion exchange HPLC followed by reverse phase chromatography. Fractions were lyophilized and resuspended in printing buffer, then printed in duplicate onto nitrocellulose-coated slides. Serum samples were hybridized with protein microarrays unisng indirect immunofluorescence protocol. For mass-spectrometry analysis, samples were trypsin-digested and subjected to mass spectrometry analysis on an LTQ-Orbitrap.
